thread.title: Jennifer Snyder
thread.title_full: Totally Wicked E-liquid USA inc. reviewed by Jennifer Snyder

author: Jennifer Snyder
title: Jennifer Snyder
text:
I want to thank Totally Wicked for being the first, after many attempts from other companies, to break my smoking habit after 17 years! I opted for the least expensive "e-cig"/vaporizer, which was all I can afford at the time and it was enough to deal with my nicotine cravings AND not even want to smoke a traditional cigarette. They have more nicotine strengths than other companies and a TON of different flavors so I will never get bored.
Great customer service. Depending on the time of day you complete your order, it usually ships same day and it usually arrives within 2-4 days. I am a loyal and happy, happy customer! Thanks Totally Wicked! I owe you my (hopefully much longer) life!
